ThingDef.label: miniature dachshund
ThingDef.description: An adorable miniature of the standard Dachshund, these comically shaped dogs were developed to assist in pest control on stately grounds. They quickly dug their place into the hearts of even the most steely and rugged groundskeepers.

ThingDef.label: miniature schnauzer
ThingDef.description: A breed typically kept for hunting small rodents. Small dog with a big bite. Not recommended for small children.

ThingDef.label: pug
ThingDef.description: A popular breed with royalty, pugs are humorous and family-friendly companions.

ThingDef.label: welsh corgi
ThingDef.description:
Known for being the favorite breed of the oldest queen on record, the Welsh Corgi makes a spunky, independent companion with an affinity for finding trouble.
In memory of Nugget - the sweetest, orneriest, candy-thievingest dog to ever trot the galaxy.

ThingDef.label: afghan hound
ThingDef.description: An ancient hound originating from deserts in far-away lands. The majority of sighthounds can trace their linage back to these majestic creatures. Sadly, their intelligence is not as awe-inspiring as their appearance.

ThingDef.label: border collie
ThingDef.description: An energetic dog valued for it's loyalty.

ThingDef.label: bull terrier
ThingDef.description: An energetic dog valued for it's loyalty.

ThingDef.label: chow chow
ThingDef.description: An ancient breed known for their fluffy coats and powerful bite. Makes a loyal companion and a formidable foe.

ThingDef.label: collie
ThingDef.description: The most beautiful dog on the rim. A valued pet known for its durability in cold weather.

ThingDef.label: doberman
ThingDef.description: Known to their owners for their kind nature and goofy personalities, they are fiercely protective of their masters and make excellent escorts in dangerous areas.

ThingDef.label: golden retriever
ThingDef.description: A beautiful dog valued for its loyalty.

ThingDef.label: greyhound
ThingDef.description: These popular sighthounds are widely known for their speed. When they are retired from fieldwork they make surprisingly adept couch potatoes.

ThingDef.label: old english sheepdog
ThingDef.description: Makes an excellent complement to a field of pristine, fluffy sheep.

ThingDef.label: standard poodle
ThingDef.description: Many believe this dog is all glamor no guts, but standard poodles are one of the most intelligent dogs in the galaxy. Highly trainable and make suitable alert dogs.

ThingDef.label: borzoi
ThingDef.description: These large dogs are very similar to greyhounds in personality and ability. They are differentiated most easily by their size and coloring. They are very gentle but independent.

ThingDef.label: bull mastiff
ThingDef.description: A reliable and courageous companion bred for asset protection by rim planet ranchers. Excellent companion for hunting large game.

ThingDef.label: caucasian shepherd
ThingDef.description: A massive dog originally bred to hunt bears, this canine makes an intimidating addition to any colony.

ThingDef.label: saint bernard
ThingDef.description: A large, kind dog common in cold, mountainous areas. Typically used in search and rescue, it's large enough to ride if the going gets rough.
